attributes.action: pass a law preventing MPs from usingng the title "Honourable" or "Right Honourable" because their gross misuse of expenses has clearly demonstrated that the majority of MPs are not honourable by any reasonable definition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a protest which I hope will enable people who are disgusted at the greed and self enrichment of MPs, and their seeming invulnerability from prosecution, to call for these people to stop calling themselves "honourable" without good reason.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
